name: Three Methods to Unseat a Fairy Monarch
name_original: Three Methods to Unseat a Fairy Monarch
description:
This game is a present for caeth as part of the 2019 Bitsy secret santa, based on the prompt "threes". I hope you like it, caeth!!

This was made in Bitsy, with various hacks, and uses some assets from the psychic swamp tileset.
